metadata.label: 内容記述
metadata.value: Corn saved the Pilgrims and fed our pioneers.Corn will help us feed the world.Eat More Corn.Corn Meal-Hominy Grits-SampThe Nation’s Most Abundant CerealPalatable and Nutritious in ItselfThe Best and Most Available Substitute for WheatYeast BreadYeast bread made with one cup (6 ounces) of corn meal to two cups of wheat flour (4 ounces each) ・a palatable and nutritious “light” bread.Fifty Ways of Cooking CornMushes Corn-meal or hominy mushes-boiled or baked, served with butter, milk, sirup, dried or fresh fruits, etc.Fried mushesHot BreadsCorn breadsZuni[ ? ] Indian breadAsh cakeHoe cakeCorn dodgersMuffinsGermsBiscuitsRollsGriddle cakesWafflesHearty DishesCorn-meal croquettesCorn meal and porkScrappleMeat and corn-meal dumplingsCorn-meal fish cakesCorn meal and eggsCorn meal or hominy and cheese or tomatoes(used instead of macaroni)Italian polentaTamalesDessertsIndian puddingCorn-meal molasses cakeGingerbreadDoughnutsFruit gemsCorn-Meal Fish BallsHomemade Hulled Corn, or Lye HominyEat some corn to-day.The United States Department of Agriculture will furnish you with recipes for using corn for breakfast, luncheon, dinnerYour family is missing delicious, economical food if you are not serving corn-meal dishes in your home.Write to-day for farmer’s bulletin 565.The United States Department of Agriculture will send you free this farmer’ bulletin, “corn meal as a food and ways of using it.” This booklet gives explicit directions for making all the dishes mentioned, and many others.U.S. Department of Agriculture, Washington, D.C.Try a wheatless meal to-morrow.（とうもろこしはプリグリムたちを救い、われわれの開拓者を養いましたとうもろこしは世界に食べ物をあたえ、われわれを助けますとうもろこしをもっと食べよう国家のもっとも豊富なシリアル今日、とうもろこしを食べましょう。朝食、昼食、夕食にアメリカ農務省[U.S. Department of Agricultur]、ワシントンD. C.今日は小麦なしの食事をしてみましょう。）
